text: Trois-Rivières is a commune. It is found in the region Hauts-de-France in the Somme department in the north of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2019 and consists of the former communes of Pierrepont-sur-Avre (the seat), Contoire and Hargicourt.Arrêté préfectoral 12 November 2018 == References == Category:2019 establishments in France Category:Communes in Somme
title: Trois-Rivières, Somme
